dominanthand.description: If you like cheating, you will use this!
dominanthand.name: Unfair Advantage

nondominanthand.description: A wooden kite shield used by students while training.
nondominanthand.name: Training Shield

location.description: It's cold and wet here underground. The long corridor leads to a room where the final boss is waiting. There's an item displayed to your left.
location.name: Dungeon

inventory.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 10HP.
inventory.name: Common Potion

inventory.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 10HP.
inventory.name: Common Potion

inventory.description: A wooden stick that's about as long as your arm. Not a very useful weapon.
inventory.name: Wooden Stick

inventory.description: A wooden sword used by students while training.
inventory.name: Training Sword

inventory.description: A sacred amulet bestowed to you by Gaianthra, it has protective energy
inventory.name: Sacred Amulet

inventory.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 50HP.
inventory.name: Health Potion

inventory.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 10HP.
inventory.name: Common Potion

inventory.description: A sacred amulet bestowed to you by Gaianthra, it has protective energy
inventory.name: Sacred Amulet

inventory.description: A purple, sparkling soda that allows you to block damage
inventory.name: Strength Soda

inventory.description: A metal shield dropped by the Hydra, it is engraved with an aquarian language
inventory.name: Lucarian Shield

inventory.name: Lucarian Shield

Advanced Training Room.description: This is the advanced training room. You should not stick around here unless you know how to fight!
Advanced Training Room.name: Advanced Training Room

Crossroads.description:
A literal crossroad with a wooden sign that says: 
 Elven Creek LEFT 
 Elven Woods RIGHT 
 Lucaria Lake UP. 

 Enter the Woods at your own risk!!!

slime.description: A red slime with beady eyes

common potion.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 10HP.
common potion.name: Common Potion

slime.name: Slime

Crossroads.name: Crossroads

Dungeon.description: It's cold and wet here underground. The long corridor leads to a room where the final boss is waiting. There's an item displayed to your left.
Dungeon.name: Dungeon

Lecture Hall.description: A small auditorium that is the main lecture hall where non-combat lessons take place.
Lecture Hall.name: Lecture Hall

lyra.description: Student of Serpent Academy. She looks grumpy!
lyra.name: Lyra

orion.description: Student of Serpent Academy. He seems grumpy!
orion.name: Orion

Lucaria Lake.description: Vast lake, Lucaria. You can see the sunlight reflecting off its surface. The view is rather nice! Up ahead you can see the boathouse.

health potion.description: A flask of red liquid that heals 50HP.
health potion.name: Health Potion

thorny dagger.description: A sharp, thorned dagger. A reward from the boatman
thorny dagger.name: Thorny Dagger

Lucaria Lake.name: Lucaria Lake

The Boathouse.description: This is the Lucaria lake boathouse.
The Boathouse.name: The Boathouse

The Courtyard.description: The expansive courtyard boasts a myriad of sculptures and beautiful architecture. You can see students and teachers milling around.
The Courtyard.name: The Courtyard

caspian.description: Student of Serpent Academy. He seems a bit sad
caspian.name: Caspian

fae.description: Student of Serpent Academy. She looks calm
fae.name: Fae

luna.description: Student of Serpent Academy. She seems chatty!
luna.name: Luna

thorne.description: Student of Serpent Academy. He seems chatty!
thorne.name: Thorne

The Elven Woods.description: The woods are eerie and dangerous but beautiful. Careful not to venture too far in, you will certainly get lost!
The Elven Woods.name: The Elven Woods

The Meadows.description: The meadows where many wildflowers bloom. Continuing travelling RIGHT will take you to Elven Woods.

imp.description: Tiny little devious creature, an imp is a trickster. Make sure to never give them your true name.
imp.name: Imp

The Meadows.name: The Meadows

The Toadstool Cafe.description: The Toadstool Cafe is a small cafe in Elven Creek. Many witches come for it's vast selection of brews.

glowberry shortcake.description: A cake made from the finest glowberries, increases mp
glowberry shortcake.name: Glowberry Shortcake

The Toadstool Cafe.name: The Toadstool Cafe

rune.description: Student of Serpent Academy. He seems sad about something
rune.name: Rune

Training Room.description: This is the training room where the students practice to fight. There are training dummies to your left as well as a training swords and training shields nearby.
Training Room.name: Training Room

calista.description: Student of Serpent Academy. She seems to be in a good mood!
calista.name: Calista
